column1: Baby Barnaby's////Great breakfast food.  The bacon is thick cut
column2: pancakes are fluffly and fruit is fresh. The orange juicer they have is awesome(seriously
column3: it's fun just to watch) and the product is delicious.  I can't really knock a place for having a long wait - that's sort of blaming them for being so good everyone wants to be there. My only complaint is they could recognize the wait is consistently very long and make it a little bit more comfortable - e.g. self serve coffee/water
